revision.text:
This is the "Construct analysis" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Construct analysis|autocomplete on namespace=Construct analysis|namespace=Construct analysis}}
{{{for template|Construct analysis}}} {| class="formtable" ! Text: | {{{field|text|property=Has text}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Text Gloss: | {{{field|text gloss|property=Has text gloss|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Informal analysis: | {{{field|informalanalysis|property=Has informal analysis}}} |- ! Comment: | {{{field|comment}}} |- ! Tags: | {{{field|tags|property=Has tags|input type=text with autocomplete}}} |- ! Entered by: | {{{field|Entered by|property=Entered by|input type=text with autocomplete|mandatory}}} |- ! Last reviewed by: | {{{field|Last reviewed by|property=Last reviewed by|input type=text with autocomplete}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|Status|property=Status|list|mandatory}}} |} '''Constructional information:''' {| class="formtable" ! Construction: | {{{field|construction|property=Instantiates construction}}} |- ! Frames: | {{{field|frames|property=Evokes frame}}} |- ! Comments: | {{{field|cxncomments}}} |} '''Constituent constructional information:''' {| class="formtable" ! Informal analysis: | {{{field|informalconstituentanalysis|property=Has informal analysis}}} |- ! Constituents: | {{{field|constituents|holds template|mandatory}}} |} '''Bindings:''' {{{field|bindings|holds template}}} '''Metaphors:''' {{{field|metaphors|holds template|mandatory}}} '''Metonymy:''' {{{field|metonymy|Property=Has metonymy description}}} '''Examples:''' {{{field|examples|holds template|mandatory}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|CA constituent|multiple|label=Constituent constructional information|embed in field=Construct analysis[constituents]}}} '''String:''' {{{field|constituent.string|property=Has string|class=metaex}}} {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|| '''Gloss:''' {{{field|constituent.gloss|property=Has string gloss|class=metagl}}} }} '''Cx Analysis link:''' {{{field|constituent.construct|property=Has cx analysis}}} '''Cxn:''' {{{field|constituent.cxn|property=Instantiates construction}}} '''Frames:''' {{{field|constituent.frames|property=Evokes frame}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|CA binding|multiple|label=Construction-frame Bindings|embed in field=Construct analysis[bindings]}}} '''Node 1:''' {{{field|binding.node1}}} '''Node 2:''' {{{field|binding.node2}}} '''Comment:''' {{{field|binding.comment}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|CA metaphor|multiple|label=Metaphor Information|embed in field=Construct analysis[metaphors]}}} '''Metaphor:''' {{{field|metaphor.metaphor|property=Involves metaphor}}} '''Evoking elements:''' {| class="formtable" ! Source: | {{{field|metaphor.evokingsourceelements|property=Has source evoking element}}} |- ! Target: | {{{field|metaphor.evokingtargetelements|property=Has target evoking element}}} |} '''Comments:''' {{{field|metaphor.comment|property=Has comment}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|CA example|multiple|label=Example sentences|embed in field=Construct analysis[examples]}}} {{{field|example.language|property=Is language|input type=text|default={{Lang|en}}|hidden}}} '''Text:''' {{{field|example.text|property=Has text|class=metaex|rows=3}}} {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|| '''Gloss:''' {{{field|example.gloss|property=Has text gloss|class=metagl|rows=3}}} '''English translation:''' {{{field|example.english translation|property=Has English translation|class=metatr|rows=3}}} }} '''Provenance:''' {{{field|example.provenance|property=Has provenance}}} '''Annotation:''' {{{field|example.annotation|property=Has annotation|rows=3|class=enformfield}}} '''Comments:''' {{{field|example.comment|property=Has comment|rows=3|class=enformfield}}} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "CxnMP" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=CxnMP|autocomplete on namespace=CxnMP|namespace=CxnMP|class=enformfield}}
{{{for template|CxnMP}}} {| class="formtable" ! CxnMPType: | {{{field|CxnMPType}}} |- ! CxnMPGroup: | {{{field|CxnMPGroup|class=enformfield}}} |- ! CxnMPDescription: | {{{field|CxnMPDescription|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Comments: | {{{field|Comments|class=enformfield}}} |- ! CxnMPQuery: | {{{field|CxnMPQueryCode|class=enformfield}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "Frame" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Frame|autocomplete on namespace=Frame|namespace=Frame}}
{{{for template|Frame}}} {| class="formtable" |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Name Gloss: | {{{field|Name gloss|property=Frame.Name gloss|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}}{{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|es|style="display:none;"|}} ! Transcription: | {{{field|Transcription|property=Frame.Transcription|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Description: | {{{field|Description|property=Has description}}} |- ! Closest FrameNet frame(s): | {{{field|FrameNet frame|property=Frame.FrameNet frame}}} |- ! Metaphor Program Alias: | {{{field|Program alias|property=Has program alias}}} |- ! Other Aliases: | {{{field|Other aliases|property=Frame.Alias}}} |- ! Comments: | {{{field|Comments|property=Frame.Comments|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Family(s): | {{{field|Family|property=Frame.Family}}} |- ! Tags: | {{{field|Tags}}} |- ! Type: | {{{field|Type|property=Frame.Type}}} |- ! Cultural Scope: | {{{field|Cultural scope|property=Has cultural scope}}} |- ! Cultural Information: | {{{field|Cultural information|property=Frame.Cultural information}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|Status|property=Status|list}}} |- ! Entered by: | {{{field|Entered by}}} |- ! Last reviewed by: | {{{field|Last reviewed by}}} |- ! Roles: | {{{field|Roles|holds template}}} |- ! Related frames: | {{{field|Related frames|holds template}}} |- ! |
|- ! Bindings: | {{{field|Bindings|holds template}}} |- ! Inferences: | {{{field|Inferences|holds template}}} |- ! Relevant LUs: | {{{field|Relevant LUs|holds template}}} |} {| class="formtable" |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest English Frame: | {{{field|LinkEnglish|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|es|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Spanish Frame: | {{{field|LinkSpanish|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|fa|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Persian Frame: | {{{field|LinkPersian|class=faformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|ru|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Russian Frame: | {{{field|LinkRussian|class=enformfield}}} |} {{{field|Applicability|property=Frame.Applicability|default={{Lang|en}}|hidden}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Role|multiple|label=Roles|embed in field=Frame[Roles]}}} {| class="formtable" ! Name: | {{{field|Role.Name|class=LocalFrameRoleName}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Gloss: | {{{field|Role.Name gloss|property=Role.Name gloss|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Type: | {{{field|Role.Type}}} |- ! Definition: | {{{field|Role.Definition}}} |- ! FrameNet Role: | {{{field|Role.FrameNet role}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Related frame|multiple|label=Related Frames|embed in field=Frame[Related frames]}}} '''Current Frame:''' {{PAGENAME}} '''Relation Type:''' {{{field|Related frame.Relation type|property=Related frame.Relation type}}} '''Related Frame:''' {{{field|Related frame.Name|property=Frame|values from namespace=Frame|class=RelatedFrameField}}} '''Description:''' {{{field|Related frame.Description}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Binding|multiple|label=Bindings|embed in field=Frame[Bindings]}}} '''Local Role:''' {{{field|Binding.Local role}}} '''Bound Role:''' {{{field|Binding.Bound role}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Inference|multiple|label=Inferences|embed in field=Frame[Inferences]}}} '''Description of Inference:''' {{{field|Inference.Description|property=Inference.Description}}} '''Type of Inference:''' {{{field|Inference.Type|property=Inference.Type}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|LUs|label=Relevant LUs|multiple|embed in field=Frame[Relevant LUs]}}} {{{field|LUs.Language|property=LUs.Language|input type=text|default={{Lang|en}}|hidden}}} {| class="formtable" ! Lemma: | {{{field|LUs.Lemmas|property=LUs.Lemmas}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "Frame family" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Frame family|autocomplete on category=Frame family}} {{#css: .enformfield { direction: ltr; text-align: left; } }}
{{{for template|Frame family}}} {| class="formtable" |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Name Gloss: | {{{field|Name gloss|property=Frame family.Name gloss|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Is subfamily of: | {{{field|is subfamily of|property=Frame subfamily of|values from category=Frame family}}} |- ! Tag: | {{{field|FrameFamilyTag|property=Tag|values from property=Tag}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|FrameFamilyStatus|property=Status|list|mandatory}}} |} {| class="formtable" |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest English Frame family: | {{{field|LinkEnglish|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|es|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Spanish Frame family: | {{{field|LinkSpanish|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|fa|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Persian Frame family: | {{{field|LinkPersian|class=faformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|ru|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Russian Frame family: | {{{field|LinkRussian|class=enformfield}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

{{#forminput:form=Glossary}}
{{{for template|Glossary}}} '''Entry:''' {{{field|Entry|property=Glossary.Entry}}} '''Other Aliases:''' {{{field|Other Aliases|property=Glossary.Alias}}} '''Description:''' {{{field|Description|property=Glossary.Description}}} '''Pertinent Form(s):''' {{{field|Applies to|property=Glossary.Applies to}}} '''Utility:''' {{{field|Utility|property=Glossary.Utility}}} '''Notation:''' {{{field|Notation|property=Glossary.Notation}}} '''Entered By:''' {{{field|Entered by|property=Entered by}}} '''Edited By:''' {{{field|Last reviewed by|property=Last reviewed by}}} {{{end template}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "IARPASourceConcept" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=IARPASourceConcept}}
{{{for template|IARPASourceConcept}}} {| class="formtable" ! SourceID: | {{{field|SourceID|property=HasIARPAId}}} |- ! Government Definition: | {{{field|Definition|property=HasConceptDefinition}}} |- ! Comments (internal): | {{{field|Comments|property=Has comments}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|Status|property=HasConceptStatus}}} |- ! Owner: | {{{field|Owner|property=HasConceptOwner}}} |- ! LUs: | {{{field|LUs|input type=textarea}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

revision.comment: Text replace - "Whitelist target LU" to "Whitelist target LUs"
revision.text:
This is the "IARPATargetConcept" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=IARPATargetConcept|namespace=IConcept|autocomplete on category=IARPATargetConcept}}
{{{for template|IARPATargetConcept}}} {| class="formtable" ! ConceptOwner: | {{{field|ConceptOwner}}} |- ! ConceptType: | {{{field|ConceptType}}} |- ! ConceptGroup: | {{{field|ConceptGroup|input type=text with autocomplete|values from property=HasConceptGroup}}} |- ! ConceptDefinition: | {{{field|ConceptDefinition}}} |- ! ConceptComment: | {{{field|ConceptComment}}} |- ! ConceptStatus: | {{{field|ConceptStatus}}} |}
==Target Concept Specification== {| class="formtable" ! Concept Frames: | {{{field|ConceptFrames|holds template}}} |- ! Whitelist LUs: | {{{field|WhitelistTargetLUs|holds template}}} |- ! Blacklist LUs: | {{{field|BlacklistTargetLUs|holds template}}} |- |}
==Source Domain Constraints== {| class="formtable" ! Blacklist Frame Families: | {{{field|BlacklistSourceFrameFamilies|holds template}}} |- ! Blacklist Frames: | {{{field|BlacklistSourceFrames|holds template}}} |- ! Blacklist LUs: | {{{field|BlacklistSourceLUs|holds template}}} |- |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Linked frame|label=Linked frames|multiple|embed in field=IARPATargetConcept[ConceptFrames]}}} {| class="formtable" ! Frame: | {{{field|Frame name|property=Is linked to from frame|values from namespace=Frame}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Whitelist target LUs|label=Whitelist Target LUs|multiple|embed in field=IARPATargetConcept[WhitelistTargetLUs]}}} {| class="formtable" ! Whitelist LU: | {{{field|WhitelistTargetLU|property=Has whitelist target LU}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Blacklist target LUs|label=Blacklist Target LUs|multiple|embed in field=IARPATargetConcept[BlacklistTargetLUs]}}} {| class="formtable" ! Blacklist LU: | {{{field|BlacklistTargetLU|property=Has blacklist target LU}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Blacklist source frame families|label=Blacklist Source Frame Families|multiple|embed in field=IARPATargetConcept[BlacklistSourceFrameFamilies]}}} {| class="formtable" ! Blacklist source frame family: | {{{field|BlacklistSourceFrameFamily|property=Has blacklist source frame family|values from category=Frame family}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Blacklist source frames|label=Blacklist Source Frames|multiple|embed in field=IARPATargetConcept[BlacklistSourceFrames]}}} {| class="formtable" ! Blacklist source frame: | {{{field|BlacklistSourceFrame|property=Has blacklist source frame|values from namespace=Frame}}} |} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Blacklist source LUs|label=Blacklist Source LUs|multiple|embed in field=IARPATargetConcept[BlacklistSourceLUs]}}} {| class="formtable" ! Blacklist source LU: | {{{field|BlacklistSourceLU|property=Has blacklist source LU}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "MetaRC" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=MetaRC|autocomplete on namespace=MetaRC|namespace=MetaRC|class=enformfield}}
{{{for template|MetaRC}}} {| class="formtable" ! MetaRC Group: | {{{field|MetaRCGroup|class=enformfield}}} |- ! MetaRC Description: | {{{field|MetaRCDescription|class=enformfield}}} |- ! MetaRC Comments: | {{{field|MetaRCComments|class=enformfield}}} |- ! MetaRC Score: | {{{field|MetaRCScore|class=enformfield}}} |- ! MetaRC QueryCode: | {{{field|MetaRCQueryCode|class=enformfield}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "Metaphor" form, used to create and edit members of the VettedMetaphor category, which live in the Metaphor namespace. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Metaphor|autocomplete on namespace=Metaphor|namespace=Metaphor}}
{{{for template|Metaphor}}} {| class="formtable" |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Name Gloss: | {{{field|Name gloss|property=Metaphor.Name gloss|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}}{{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|es|style="display:none;"|}} ! Name Transcription: | {{{field|Name transcription|property=Metaphor.Name transcription|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Aliases: {{#info: Note: the name of the metaphor should be entered as an alias.}} | {{{field|Aliases|holds template}}} |- ! Description: | {{{field|Description|property=Has description}}} |- ! Comments: | {{{field|Comments|property=Metaphor.Comments|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Tags: | {{{field|Tags|property=Tag|input type=text with autocomplete}}} |- ! Family(s): | {{{field|Family|property=Metaphor.Family|values from property=Metaphor.Family|input type=text with autocomplete}}} |- ! Metaphor Level: | {{{field|Metaphor Level|property=Metaphor.Level}}} |- ! Metaphor Type: | {{{field|Metaphor Type|property=Metaphor.Type|list}}} |- ! Experiential Basis: | {{{field|Experiential basis|property=Metaphor.Experiential basis}}} |- ! Cultural Scope: | {{{field|Cultural scope|property=Has cultural scope}}} |- ! Source Frame: | {{{field|Source frame|property=Metaphor.Source frame|values from namespace=Frame|class=RoleLookupField}}} |- ! Target Frame: | {{{field|Target frame|property=Metaphor.Target frame|values from namespace=Frame|class=RoleLookupField}}} |- ! |
   
|- ! Mappings: | {{{field|Mappings|holds template}}} |- ! Related metaphors: | {{{field|Related metaphors|holds template}}} |- ! Entailments: | {{{field|Entailments|holds template}}} |- ! Examples: | {{{field|Examples|holds template}}} |- ! Entered by: | {{{field|Entered by|property=Entered by|input type=text with autocomplete}}} |- ! Last reviewed by: | {{{field|Last reviewed by|property=Last reviewed by|input type=text with autocomplete}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|Status|property=Status|list}}} |- ! Metaphor Program Alias: | {{{field|Program alias|property=Has program alias}}} |} {| class="formtable" |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest English Metaphor: | {{{field|LinkEnglish|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|es|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Spanish Metaphor: | {{{field|LinkSpanish|class=enformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|fa|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Persian Metaphor: | {{{field|LinkPersian|class=faformfield}}} |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|ru|style="display:none;"|}} ! Closest Russian Metaphor: | {{{field|LinkRussian|class=enformfield}}} |} {{{field|Investigated for|property=Metaphor.Investigated for|default={{Lang|en}}|hidden}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Metaphor.Alias|multiple|label=Aliases|embed in field=Metaphor[Aliases]}}} '''Alias:''' {{{field|Metaphor.Alias.Name}}} '''Provenance:''' {{{field|Metaphor.Alias.Provenance|property=Metaphor.Alias.Provenance|values from property=Metaphor.Alias.Provenance|input type=text with autocomplete}}} '''Page number:''' {{{field|Metaphor.Alias.Page no}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Mapping|multiple|label=Mappings|embed in field=Metaphor[Mappings]}}} '''Target Role:''' {{{field|Target|property=Mapping.Target}}} '''Source Role:''' {{{field|Source|property=Mapping.Source}}} '''Comment:''' {{{field|Comment|property=Mapping.Comment|class=enformfield}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Related metaphor|multiple|label=Related Metaphors|embed in field=Metaphor[Related metaphors]}}} '''Current Metaphor:''' {{PAGENAME}} '''Type of Relation:''' {{{field|Related metaphor.Relation type|property=Related metaphor.Relation type|mandatory}}} '''Related Metaphor:''' {{{field|Related metaphor.Name|property=Related metaphor.Name|values from namespace=Metaphor|mandatory}}} '''Description of Relation:''' {{{field|Related metaphor.Description}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Entailment|multiple|label=Entailments|embed in field=Metaphor[Entailments]}}} '''Target Entailment:''' {{{field|Entailment.Target entailment|property=Entailment.Target entailment}}} '''Source Inference:''' {{{field|Entailment.Source inference}}} '''Type of Inferential Structure:''' {{{field|Entailment.Type|property=Entailment.Type}}} '''Entailed metaphor(s):''' {{{field|Entailment.Entailed metaphors|input type=text with autocomplete|values from namespace=Metaphor}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Example|multiple|label=Examples|embed in field=Metaphor[Examples]}}} {{{field|Example.Language|property=Example.Language|input type=text|default={{Lang|en}}|hidden}}} '''Text:''' {{{field|Example.Text|property=Example.Text|class=metaex|rows=3}}} {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|| '''Gloss:''' {{{field|Example.Gloss|property=Example.Gloss|class=metagl|rows=3}}} {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|es|| '''Transcription:''' {{{field|Example.Transcription|property=Example.Transcription|class=metagl|rows=3}}} }} '''English translation:''' {{{field|Example.English translation|property=Example.English translation|class=metatr|rows=3}}} }} '''Provenance:''' {{{field|Example.Provenance|property=Example.Provenance}}} '''Annotation:''' {{{field|Example.Annotation|property=Example.Annotation|rows=3|class=enformfield}}} '''Comments:''' {{{field|Example.Comments|property=Example.Comments|rows=3|class=enformfield}}} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

<noinclude>
This is the "Metaphor Search Query" form. It should be used via the [[Special:RunQuery/Metaphor Search Query|special 'run query']] page.
</noinclude><includeonly>
{{{for template|Metaphor Search}}}

{| class="formtable"
! Search Metaphors:
| {{{field|searchstring}}}
|}
{{{end template}}}

</includeonly>

This is the "Metaphor family" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Metaphor family}} {{#css: .enformfield { direction: ltr; text-align: left; } }}
{{{for template|Metaphor family}}} {| class="formtable" |- {{#ifeq:{{Lang|}}|en|style="display:none;"|}} ! Name Gloss: | {{{field|Name gloss|property=Metaphor family.Name gloss|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Type: | {{{field|Metaphor family type|property=Metaphor family.Type|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Description: | {{{field|Description|property=Metaphor family.Description|class=enformfield}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|Metaphor family status|property=Status|list|mandatory}}} |- ! Is subfamily of: | {{{field|is subfamily of|property=Metaphor family of|values from property=Metaphor.Family|delimiter=,}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}
